name: Bird Copter - Fly in One Perfect Line
name_original: Bird Copter - Fly in One Perfect Line
description:
”Attractive Graphics.”
“Challenging game physics!”
”Challenging and Addictive levels.”
___________________________________

Bird Copter game is pretty much similar to the original bird game! Tap on the screen to flap your wings and fly like a bird. Fly the copter as far as possible without hitting a pipe. You have to make your way through many hurdles placed randomly in your path.

Click on the screen, or use your spacebar to get started. The goal is to make a bigger score and keep Bird Copter in the air for the maximum time possible. Improve your ability to control the mouse with this amazing game of talent. Show of your expertise and compete with the best gamers out there!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Challenging Levels
Challenging Endless Jump & Run Game
Nice graphics
100% secure! Anti Virus tested!
